title: Performance Timing Test Suite
iWant: to measure and validate system response times across critical user workflows
soThat: I can ensure the application meets performance SLAs and identify bottlenecks before they impact users
description: Implement comprehensive timing tests that measure response times for API endpoints, page loads, and database queries to maintain system performance standards

acceptanceTests.title: API Response Time Validation
acceptanceTests.description: Given API endpoints are deployed, when I execute timing tests, then all endpoints respond within 200ms for 95% of requests

acceptanceTests.title: Database Query Performance
acceptanceTests.description: Given database queries are executed, when I measure execution times, then complex queries complete within 500ms and simple queries within 50ms

acceptanceTests.title: Page Load Performance
acceptanceTests.description: Given web pages are accessed, when I measure load times, then pages render within 2 seconds on standard network conditions

acceptanceTests.title: Performance Regression Detection
acceptanceTests.description: Given baseline performance metrics exist, when new code is deployed, then timing tests detect any regression greater than 10% and alert the team
